statements: UPDATE GenomicData SET mutation_type = 'missense' WHERE sample_id = '9ec4e78b-8e3c-4e13-b467-7d8e5670d304'

UPDATE patient_genetic_data SET genetic_data = '{"SNP1": "AA", "SNP2": "CC"}' WHERE patient_id = 1;

UPDATE patient_data SET age = 30, diagnosis = 'Healthy' WHERE patient_id = 101
